title: Lesson in Compassion
subtitle: Was an actor disguised as a beggar used to test divinity students' compassion?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Students at a religious institute enrolled in a class on the life of Jesus arrive at their classroom to take the final exam and find a notice informing them that the test will be given in another building on the other side of the campus. As the students rush across campus to the new room, each is accosted by a forlorn beggar who entreats their help. None of the students stops for him, however — they all rush by, anxious to arrive on time for the exam.
